title: FPS DROP / Freeze
body:
Hello the past 2 patchs i have noticed a severe drop in FPS and now with the latest patch a slight freeze then the game resumes as normal.

OLD FPS --160-180
NEW FPS 65-160 about a 100 FPS
Now slight skip then back to normall in FPS.


Its gotten worse.

I have taken all the steps on my side of the PC.

-Latest windows updates
-All unused programs are off PC
-No issue with Router or Modem.
-Repaired game with hex tool
-This is the only game giving me these issues.


Does anyone have a fix for this yet or a work around?

replies.body: Latest windows update, hmmmmm. Do me a favor and check to make sure that Game DVR is still turned off, it's been known to cause a lot of issues with League and it keeps coming back after updates. If it's not that, double check for driver updates and DirectX as well, and let me know if those updates help!
I've been having horrible FPS like 80-90 with a 1080 and i7-7700k this game is optimized so poorly its annoying
Its the Patch. Whrite RIOT a ticket pls
